r.s: Creates and reads DTA and DTAZV files containing money transaction data (Germany).
r.d: Payment_DTA provides functions to create and read DTA and DTAZV files used in Germany to exchange informations about money transactions with banks or online banking programs.
r.n: [+] add parameter exec_date to setAccountFileSender (#18389, #18773) ( [+] Added [-] Fixed [*] Improved [!] Note )
